title: Design for Printed Textile-Quatrafoil, Series #625-630
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Colored tissue, construction paper, graphite, mounted on white tracing paper
description: Four petaled flower motif in cut out pink and red tissue paper and black paper arranged in four rows of six
name: collage
